Title: Dissolves the Rockland county drainage agency and transfers its powers to the Rockland county highway department; repealer
Summary: Dissolves the Rockland county drainage agency and transfers its powers to the Rockland county highway department; repeals provisions relating to creating a stream control act for the county of Rockland and defining its powers and duties.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to dissolving the Rockland county drainage agency; and to repeal chapter 846 of the laws of 1975, relating to creating a stream control act for the county of Rockland and defining its powers and duties
